name: Kick it For Money - Soccer UEFA Euro 2016 Edition
name_original: Kick it For Money - Soccer UEFA Euro 2016 Edition
description:
◆ Winning isn’t everything. It’s the only thing. ◆

This Kick It was especially made for the European Soccer Championship. Enjoy the greatest ball game ever! Receive special bonuses in game and keep coming back to kick it during the Euro 2016!

A must Download Game for Soccer & Sport Fans !

Enjoy endless fun accompanied by limitless cash prizes! Download our app for free now, feel like a part of the Championships, make your first real money deposit and Kick It For Money will not only guarantee you lots of fun but also great rewards and bonuses for the Euro!

◆ The best soccer Game in the AppStore ◆

► Place finger on ball
► Swipe to shoot the ball into the goal
► Apply pressure on the screen to curve the soccer ball
► Compare with opponents score
► Win Real Money

Why Kick It For Money is awesome:

◉ Real money and free games available around the clock
◉ Regular promotions, bonuses and special tournaments
◉ Thousands of players online every day
◉ EURO 2016 EDITION

Kick it For Money brings a lot of exciting features, including:

◉ Real Money Cash Competitions.
◉ Quality HD graphics.
◉ Exciting Football Designs (Great Soccer Balls of Fire)
◉ Even more Special Bonuses and Promotions!

Make sure you accept push notifications when you download our mobile Kick it app, to ensure that you don’t miss out on any of our great promotions during the Euro 2016.

Apple is not associated with or responsible for any contests within this app.
